page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT WELBURY &DEIGHTON
page.content: The majority of employed people travel daily to the industrial centre of Cleveland. The main employer is the chemical company I.C.I. which has plants at Billingham & Wilton.Some engineers are employed by companies connected with module building for North Sea oil rigs & other oil related services.Other occupations include Local Government,education,Health Service,building and agriculture.There are some self-employed people including 2 builders, a motor-engineer a milkman and a poultry/game dealer in Welbury.Most of the farms are family run,with little hired help apart from Applegarth Manor which employs a farm manager.At Manor House Farm Mr.Edwin & Mr.Charlie Nunn breed and show Clydesdale horses as well as run their farm.In Deighton there is the Grain Merchants & a Riding School.
